subject: AI & Agents
title: Query Understanding: What Did the User Mean?
description: A fast breakdown of Query Understanding: What Did the User Mean? for builders.

hook.text: User types 'apple.' Do they want the fruit, the company, or the record label?

buildup.text: Query understanding disambiguates user intent from short, ambiguous search queries.

discovery.text: Techniques: query expansion, spell correction, entity recognition, and intent classification.

twist.text: Context matters: the same query from a developer vs a chef means completely different things.

climax.text: Personalized query understanding uses user history to resolve ambiguity automatically.

punchline.text: Understand the question before searching for the answer.

quiz.question: What does query understanding solve?
options: Disambiguating user intent from short, ambiguous queries
